nars.nal

Enum LocalRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<LocalRules>
      • nars.nal.LocalRules
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<LocalRules>

    public enum LocalRules
extends java.lang.Enum<LocalRules>
    Directly process a task by a oldBelief, with only two Terms in both. In matching, the new task is compared with an existing direct Task in that Concept, to carry out:

    revision: between judgments or goals on non-overlapping evidence; satisfy: between a Sentence and a Question/Goal; merge: between items of the same type and stamp; conversion: between different inheritance relations.

        public static Budget solutionEval(@NotNull
                                  Task question,
                                  @NotNull
                                  Task solution,
                                  @NotNull
                                  NAR nar)
        Evaluate the quality of a belief as a solution to a problem, then reward the belief and de-prioritize the problem
        Parameters:
        question - The problem (question or goal) to be solved
        solution - The belief as solution
        question - The task to be immediately processed, or null for continued process
        Returns:
        The budget for the new task which is the belief activated, if necessary
